embeds.title: Diane (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Diane
Earth-element giant (though appearing small in-game). Axe applies Breaker CC for massive damage multipliers; Gauntlets deals DEF-scaling damage and provides Heavy Metal reaction immunity; Nunchucks spreads Petrify through sustained hits with excellent Earth Burst team barrier synergy.
